response.overview: After learning that a boy their age has been accidentally killed near their rural homes, four Oregon boys decide to go see the body. On the way, Gordie,  Vern, Chris and Teddy encounter a mean junk man and a marsh full of leeches, as they also learn more about one another and their very different home lives. Just a lark at first, the boys' adventure evolves into a defining event in their lives.
response.tagline: For some, it's the last real taste of innocence, and the first real taste of life.
response.title: Stand by Me

titles.title: Stand by Me - Ricordo di un'estate
Stand by me - Compte sur moi
スタンド・バイ・ミー
スタンド・バイ・ミー：1986
